oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Royal Crown Cola - 1955-10-29 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Royal Crown Cola sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 29, 1955 (date unconfirmed). Featuring Ott Devine (announcer), Louie Buck (host) and performers Hank Snow, the Fruit Jar Drinkers, Kirk McGee, Cousin Jody and his Country Cousins, the Louvin Brothers, Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys, Justin Tubb, Bill Carlisle and the Carlisles, Tommy Vaden, and Chubby Wise. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Monroe; Blue Grass Boys; Justin Tubb; Bill Carlisle; Carlisles; Hank Snow; Tommy Vaden; Chubby Wise
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Put My Little Shoes Away (Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys) [continued in part 2] -- Louie Buck introduces Justin Tubb -- Pepper Hot Baby (Justin Tubb) -- Louie Buck introduces Bill Carlisle and the Carlisles -- Little Liza Jane (Bill Carlisle and the Carlisles) -- Royal Crown Cola commercial (Ott Devine, Louie Buck) -- Louie Buck introduces Hank Snow -- Born To Be Happy (Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Tommy Vaden and Chubby Wise -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Tommy Vaden fiddle, Chubby Wise fiddle) -- Closing statement (Louie Buck, Hank Snow) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Snow, Hank; Carlisle, Bill; Carlisles (Musical group); Fruit Jar Drinkers (Musical group); McGee, Kirk, 1899-1983; Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Blue Grass Boys; Cousin Jody; Country Cousins (Musical group : Cousin Jody); Vaden, Tommy; Wise, Chubby
